name: Moonbase (itch) (SaxOps1)
description:
Stranded on a moon, you must avoid being hit by incoming asteroids and survive!

Made for Ludum Dare #51 - Theme: Every 10 seconds

Collect the resources dropped by the crashed asteroids, and use them to build defences.

Place platforms for navigation or cover, as well as batteries and guns to shoot incoming asteroids.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • 1/2/3 buttons to select blocks
  • Mouse Click to place blocks

Blocks:

  1. Platform - Takes 4 hits
  2. Battery - Charges a gun for 10 seconds
  3. Gun - Shoots the closest asteroid

Post your high score below!

Made by SaxOps1

All art assets by Kenney
